XIP5lbKXW7jiTheDpWK1_Q.text: Just left this place & I gotta say I'm super impressed! Love the hippie style oatmeal! The atmosphere of this place is great & the girl working the counter was friendly and welcoming :) right across the street from my work- I will definitely be back!!

uYCKhxzryn6WcLlfJbRoZg.text: Awesome place for smoothies, sandwiches and cold-brewed coffee! Good service and pleasant, no nonsense ambiance. This was the perfect lunch spot after a hike up Camelback on a super hot day.

photos.caption: Photo of The Brown Bag - Phoenix, AZ, United States

lO-dOu4hk_4bQYT7yqRojA.text: I really enjoy the brown bag. I'll hang out and work from here every once in a while. The whole staff is friendly and the food is great. I always get the hazelnut latte.

l22uck0WrzSqZuWbg4YfCw.text: Excellent food, I get the Paisano. The balsamic vinaigrette is heavenly. Excellent service from the owner, Jerry who is always working. Definitely stop by for great sandwiches and an even better atmosphere. Keep small local businesses like this alive!

vsdXYEsgbeVUqot_jlcv9A.text: The food was amazing and service was spot on!! I had a Pop's Chicken Salad Sandwich and it was wonderful! Jerry the owner was a very down to earth guy. Love these mom & pop shops! Highly recommend.

a-qh56LvDP9-P3mnzCbyrg.text: Excellent food and service.  Great menu. I have been there two days in a row.  They even have dog biscuits.  Yeah!

z_GE8snfd2Mdnk7j-5X04Q.text: FANTASTIC!!!!  Steps away from my hotel. I had the Benny sandwich and could not have enjoyed more. The server was very friendly and helpful. Will absolutely be back.

7MnQhxRZ3Jms4c1aCVhilQ.text: Decent food but nothing special. Good service and clean restaurant. Doesn't seem like anything you can't make at home.

x3FSwoNsG2owZvHKzWNUUg.text: We came here with our kids after a Saturday hike, and it was a great choice. Everything we ordered was delicious, the service was friendly and fast. Great new place for us.

n1Jd0_Pw0L6LcTZuk3-U6w.text: It was almost closed when I went by, and my iced coffee from them was pretty basic, so I didn't have high expectations.  But the sandwich was amazing (roast beef) and the potato salad so good it was actually with mentioning.  Nice furniture but needs music.   Really great take out.

5lPt4uwPbZoIJWYjWuEzqQ.text: Stopped in as it was close the hotel, Jerry was friendly and the sandwich and salad were great.  Highly recommend!!

-ImIGM7qcnw7qmdq2TJFuw.text: Stopped in and had a breakfast sandwich called The Benny. It was very tasty. The ciabatta bread was fresh and soft. The coffee is also very good. The owners were wonderful.  Definitely  recommend this place.

photos.caption: Photo of The Brown Bag - Phoenix, AZ, United States

J268rF8NHn2JJ49e5JkDCA.text: The food is awesome, service is a little slow at busy times, but they are super friendly and care about the customers. I've had four or five sandwiches and they are all great, as is the potato salad. The Caprese is my favorite!

nnszp_PN14hLvIPJv6Fm2A.text: Great customer service, great food. I highly recommend The Firebird sandwich! I'm moving out of state soon and wish I could take this place with me. I never write Yelp reviews, but this place deserves the praise.

M3gN_Vx7VjrJDCqjEMdk0g.text: Came here for the first time for lunch. Staff was cheerful and helpful, going the extra mile to get us what we needed. Outdoor seating was great. Lots of options for sandwiches hot and cold, with smoothies, too. We all got different things and everybody loved it. Generous portions!

gAXbBQTnSIKJQuNjvL2bew.text: I have heard wonderful things about this place so I went for the first time today... and now I know EXACTLY why everyone says such great things about this place!! the service was spectacular! and I got the chicken salad sandwich.... (which I'm very picky about) and OMG....... FREAKING AMAZING!!! My family and I will definitely be coming here on a  regular basis..and I work at a local  shop around the corner so I definitely will be telling my co-workers about it!! I asked Jerry if they deliver and he said no, not yet but if I order before or just after lunch rush, he will deliver it to us!  who does that!?! only a wonderful restaurant that genuinely cares about their customers! and also did I mention, they are pet friendly??!! They have a giant jar of dog treats and water bowls on their patio area! Thank you so much guys! We are so excited to have discovered you!!

gnTad85__c6PUm8QD9soUQ.text: I was visiting Phoenix for 4 days and ended up eating here 3 times. The restaurant had a great atmosphere and the owner was very friendly! The menu has a wide variety of choices. Each day I tried something new and was not disappointed. Great quality, fresh ingredients. I would highly recommend this restaurant.

photos.caption: Photo of The Brown Bag - Phoenix, AZ, United States

repUzYPRWuOerCS2pfHC9w.text: Great food and great service! I had a breakfast sandwich, coffee, muffins and a lunch sandwich to go and it was all great. The customer service was outstanding.

J5wrUyS7yI9TR2Lgso0xAg.text: 5 stars for the food and coffee. 4 for the space and ambience...and they were out of coffee when we got here at 10am.  Father-in-law used the word "tremeeeendous" to describe the blueberry muffin which I have to say I was drooling over.  I had the original with chorizo which had just the right amount of spice. Wife had the Florentino which she def gave a 5 star. The ciabatta was fresh...not to chewy, not to tough and crunchy. Coffee was strong and yummy. Gotta be careful, it goes down so smooth I got a buzz in no time. Highly recommended.

saAjk-RD7iEDhIKqhRrE4w.text: Tucked away in a shopping center by the Hilton resort, this place does not disappoint. Had the Kennedy breakfast sandwich. The bread was light, crusty, soft and warm. The eggs and bacon perfectly cooked, and the cream cheese and avocado deliciously rounded out the sandwich. Wish I had time to try everything on the menu.

T355OMeTCTWMO7LBglKkgA.text: Best Blueberry muffin I have ever had! We got a little of everything and they where all great! We got a bagel with butter and it was Amazing!!! The egg whites and bacon where Delish. I loved the breakfast burrito without veggies. I would highly recommend this place. Great service!!

photos.caption: Photo of The Brown Bag - Phoenix, AZ, United States. Front of the store

lr1GAJ0AiKCMWhdJIG6I0A.text: Nice place. Quaint. Maggie the owner is personable and made me a great "health nut" sandwich!! I'll definitely go again!

6aCJhCNZEl-woK6KeizdJg.text: What a surprise! Don't be fooled by the seventies graphics on their sign! This place makes amazing sandwiches. Found it through Yelp and we will definitely be back. Comforting in its simplicity and care...the way sandwich shops used to be in the seventies! Loved it. The Reuben rocks.

nsc-50Q1Cx4MBy4XdXilwg.text: Best sandwiches in town.  Great service!  We loved the K-lob club was amazing!  Thanks Ali for the great food and service!

ABKyg3AGBSzJJcldIL-gVg.text: We were staying at the Hilton down the road and decided to check the Brown Bag out based on it's reviews.  We were not disappointed, food was delicious and the staff was very friendly!  I would highly recommend them.   They are the real deal!

eIYmlH0MGFZN9xBU1qObug.text: I absolutely adore this place!  Their original location is in Telluride, Colorado (where i grew up) -- and when i found out they had a location here in phoenix, i was leaping for joy!  It's my little piece of home all in one sandwich shop.  The owners are super friendly. Im surprised to know that jerry remembers my mom back home, cuz they used to do business together.   I highly recommend their "Benny" sandwich. Basically an Eggs Benedict on ciabatta.   Will be definitely coming back again soon!

c-SJymvIwHU5RackJPlq2w.text: We ordered the Kennedy Breakfast Sandwich and the daily special- the Jae's sub. I live right down the street and heard such great reviews about this place and was excited to finally check it out. Such a disappointment. The daily special was the worst $10 sandwich I have ever tried and the breakfast sandwich was hot, but with runny eggs and zero flavor. Would not recommend this place for someone looking for fresh flavor and a meal worth the price.

BEa6zQ5GZz0C8DZbVtN6jw.text: It's a great hidden gem. It's perfect if you are staying at the Pointe Hilton Squaw Peak and want to get away from the over priced food at Rico's. The food is fresh and the baked items are great. I wish they had more of a diverse selection of baked goods but the ones they have are great, especially the chocolate chip cookies. If you are looking for some good food that is reasonably priced come here.

4or-S893A4QuxnUHsV5O8A.text: I love the way my coworkers drool over my lunch when I bring in my Brown Bag takeout!

5wLebWQ00cPPWZ8ZkgrGWA.text: Stayed at nearby Pointe Hilton and ate here every breakfast and lunch. Wanted fresher food at more reasonable prices than the resort.  Good clean deli with great service and healthy good food. Opened at 6 which is good since I was on East coast time. I really enjoyed the Kennedy for breakfast and the Pops Chicken Salad sandwich for lunch.

FaLE_q3A0a62iTNOqzIsCw.text: We are really sad that we live 10 hours away because we LOVED this place! We even went back 2 days in a row. The staff is helpful and friendly. Our food came out very quick, and everything we tried was delicious! We suggest the K-lob klub, and firebird hot sandwiches. Our 2 year old devoured the plain Jane oatmeal-how can one go wrong with brown sugar and raisins?!

FXqA-GW0TLd861b_y3KTYQ.text: This is a great little, local sandwich shop, a must try if you are in the area and even if you aren't and you want a good Sammy it's worth the travel.

bpl95Bamc5ljEAwRfY8TAg.text: This little shop right here knows how to make a great sandwich. Quality every time you go. My personal favorites are the Paisano, The Reuben, and the Smoo. Half sandwich an half salad lunch special is perfect! Great place and great owners!

PTAIJN5VCLjjcaKag3lBBg.text: First time here today. Ordered the Health Nut sandwich with potato salad as my side. The salad was very dry and in a Costco size sample cup. I must say the sandwich was very tasty but lacked with amount of turkey on it. This is the reason for only 3 stars - I felt this sandwich was extremely overpriced for what I actually got. NOTE: Just saw on the take out menu the potato salad is an extra dollar. Didn't realize this when I ordered as I was only given side choices, NOT TOLD this was extra!  Save your money and get one of the sides that come with sandwich. It was definitely not worth any extra money.

qckLb7RK41xLTOsJC2JndQ.text: It was a fairly early morning and I really wanted some coffee and a muffin. I found this place on yelp and headed on over. The coffee was very good, I got an iced latte with hazelnut and vanilla flavoring. I also got a coffee cake muffin and the inside was good but the edges were hard. My total was $9.42.. that was a little pricy so I won't be back

UhrfY7_TleYniZgyaGbjug.text: And I love to day dream!  Ali whips up a serious cup and the menu is fresh and has great variety.  They have weekly specials too which is nice to see.  The Kennedy sandwich is on point, you cant go wrong ordering the avocado, bacon and egg marriage!  Back to my Daydreamer...

photos.caption: Photo of The Brown Bag - Phoenix, AZ, United States. The Daydreamer, it does not disappoint!

pLld_7lBsmNX4Ocq19xvFQ.text: Great breakfast sandwiches  and very friendly staff. Their cibata bread was moist and soft and not the typical dry and dense. KENEDY and especially PONCHO are delish!!

pAQJ8HEqkHi-BYo2avejag.text: The sand which and latte I had here were good, but what really stands out is how they treat their customers. Their customer service is top notch. Also, the atmosphere has a really nice vibe and the outdoor seating looked very relaxing.
